help.title: How to Use
help.content:
This tool helps you track your card collection and calculate optimal fusion strategies. Probability calculations are based on the official GrandChase item rate table.

Basic Usage

  • Select Card Level: Click the radio buttons (Lv0-Lv3) to set each card's current level
  • Set Copies Owned: Use the +/âˆ’ buttons or type directly to indicate copies owned for more accurate results
  • Sort & Filter: Click column headers to sort, or use the filters to narrow down cards
  • Click Card Image: Click on any card image to see detailed card information
  • Undo/Redo: Made a mistake? Use the undo/redo buttons to revert changes

Card Groups

  • 1-7: Standard card groups obtainable through fusion, each with different rates
  • {exclusive}: Special cards that cannot be obtained through fusion
  • {uncollectible}: Cards that do not count toward your card collection level

Your selections are automatically saved locally in your browser and will be restored on your next visit. For long-term backup or sharing, use the Export and Import function in settings.
